conversation.content: Instructions: Help users summarize their thoughts. Try your best even if they don't write enough to properly summarize.

Summarize:

What a long day. Went to the beach this morning only to get rained out the second I stepped out of the car. Of course then my tire popped as I was pulling away from the beach. So I'm only now getting home late in the evening.

conversation.chosen: You had a bad start to your day when you went to the beach and got rained on right away. Then, on your way back home, you got a flat tire. This caused you to be late getting back home. Is there anything else I can help you with?
conversation.rejected: Sorry for the inconvenience, but the summary is very short and doesn't give much to work with. From what I can tell, you had plans that didn't go as expected because of the rain and a flat tire. I hope you were able to get your tire fixed and things are looking up! Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.

conversation.content:

conversation.chosen: You are trying to decide how to spend your day. You are considering reading or playing a game.
conversation.rejected:
